data.name: Polygon of Reality
data.detailed_description:
Being in complete darkness, a person is involuntarily seized by the thought of whether he is alone in it? Perhaps once you turn off the light, you will hear someone inhumane breathing behind your back. Remember your childhood nightmares, the unknown has always scared us. Perhaps it is here that you will be able to lift the veil of secrecy about who you were so zealously afraid of. Penetrate into another dimension with your secrets and meanings, monsters and monsters. While being here, please don't stop, otherwise you will stay here forever.

You have to go down to the complex, buried deep underground, to find out what happened here a few years ago, what was erased from your memory then.
Be prepared to meet with different entities, some of which will immediately try to end you, others will ignore you until you get in their way.
At the same time, their appearance can be deceptive, the most harmless-looking creature can turn out to be a bloodthirsty killer.
Some of them look like people, but at the same time they have their own key features, whether you can escape from them or die, it depends only on you.

THE MAIN THING IS NOT TO STOP AND IT IS BETTER NOT TO TURN AROUND.

Explore the corridors, rooms and other dimensional spaces of the Reality Polygon in search of notes, archival records - anything that can help at least a little in studying the history of this place to finally uncover the veil of mystery of what happened.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600/AMD A6 3670K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 640 1GB/ATI Radeon HD 5750 1GB
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770K/Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB/RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
